info.name: VLIVE Dark Theme
info.description: Dark theme for the V LIVE website. I've also made a script that lets you rotate the video
info.additionalInfo:
- [27/04/2019] Updated everything to align with V LIVE's latest theme.
- [23/03/2019] Made the scrollbars dark.
- [19/09/2018] Updated the channel page.
- [13/05/2018] Updated rekorex's style to work with the V LIVE website's latest theme.
